data.name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Character Song (Rena)
data.detailed_description:
Rena's character song for the Grisaia Phantom Trigger series.
All tracks are in both WAV and MP3 formats.

1. Hollow love

　Vocals: Rena (Voiced by Maaya Uchida)
　Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima
　Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)

　Bass: Ryutaro Fujinaga (Elements Garden)
　Guitar: Hitoshi Fujima

　All Other Instruments & Programming: Hitoshi Fujima

　Mixed by Yasuhiro Shirai
　Directed by Hitoshi Fujima
　Recorded at ARIA studio
　Sound Production by Elements Garden
　Production Management: Asami Suita (ARIA entertainment)

2. Hollow love (instrumental ver.)

3. Hollow love (short ver.)

4. Hollow love (short instrumental ver.)


Note:
These audio tracks are downloaded as DLC, and are saved to the same destination folder as the game files.
To check the destination folder, right-click on the "Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.4" icon in your Steam library, and select Properties. Then click on the Local Files tab, then select "Browse Local Files".

WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
